description: Learn how to make these devilishly scary eyeball jelly cups with only five simple ingredients. Theyâ€™re extremely easy to make and are sure to impress.
name: Easy Halloween Eyeball Jelly Cups Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: black and red writing icing (to decorate)

recipeInstructions.text: Place jelly crystals in a large jug, then add 2 cups boiling water and stir until dissolved. Top with 1 2/3 cups cold water and stir to combine. Divide among 6 x 1cup capacity glasses, then refrigerate for 4 hours or until set.
To make the eyes, halve marshmallows horizontally, then top sticky side with a Smartie. Use writing icing to draw veins and pupils. Allow to set before topping jellies, then serve.
